title: Graduate harvest
brief_description: Massey College, situated in Palmerston North, is an agricultural college attached to the university of New Zealand. Students, including many from other parts of the world, attend coursers in horticulture, fruit growing, cheese and butter making, dairying and the raising of sheep and pigs.
